title: AI Techniques Dataset Schema (Updated)
description: Extended schema for the techniques_v2.csv dataset which catalogs AI techniques with their properties, including model-specific information

description.description: Description of what the technique does and how it works

model_dependency.description: Whether the technique works with any model or requires specific model types

applicable_models.description: JSON string containing model types this technique is specifically applicable to

assurance_goals.description: Primary goals related to AI assurance (e.g., Explainability, Fairness, Privacy, etc.)

attributes.description: JSON string containing structured attributes of the technique, including explanatory scope (global/local)

example_use_cases.description: JSON string containing examples of how the technique can be used in practice

limitations.description: JSON string containing limitations and drawbacks of the technique

resources.description: JSON string containing resources related to the technique (papers, libraries, etc.)

complexity_rating.description: Rating of implementation complexity on a scale from 1 to 5

computational_cost_rating.description: Rating of computational cost on a scale from 1 to 5
